channel.title: JavaScript on DI Herbert Mühlburger
channel.description: Recent content in JavaScript on DI Herbert Mühlburger

item.title: JavaScript Rising Stars 2017
item.description: I found an intersting article on the rising stars in the JavaScript world in 2017. There are the most important sections taken from the report. Most Popular Projects Overall Vue.js strikes again Once again, Vue.js is the trendiest project of the year, with more than 40,000 stars added on GitHub during the year. Front-end Frameworks The Big-3: Vue, React and Angular Without surprise, the 3 most popular UI frameworks are Vue.

item.title: Google Wave API combined with the Wookie engine and integrated in a Moodle platform
item.description: Everybody who is interesteded in Widget Mash-ups forPersonal Learning Environments (PLEs) should take a look at this article posted on Scott Wilson’s Workblog. He demonstrates a very nice usage of the Google Wave API in combination with the Wookie engine integrated into a Moodle platform. Here is a part of his blogpost: I’ve created a Moodle course that uses some widgets, all of which make use of the Wave Gadget API.
